section.name: The right download
section.p: The Publisher's AstroGrid Library includes a ready-made webapplication for catalogues of sky objects stored in relational databases. There is also a ready-made webapp for solar images stored as FITS files on a disk, but this has not been fully tested. We intend to release more ready-made webapps for other common datasets (such as pixel images of the sky).
The various PAL libraries can also be downloaded from our repository here. </p

body.section:
The ready-made skycatserver webapp is intended for publishing sky object catalogues that are stored in a tabular dataset and generally served as a table.
The Web Application Archive (WAR) file can be downloaded from our repository here.
>
